segments.text: I see the boy is really going for those cookies, and I can't help but feel a bit excited for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's being so brave, climbing up on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently for her share, and it's really cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll be able to get away with it without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, but it's almost like a fun challenge for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, but I also hope they stay safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so full of energy and excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit envious of their adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like they're on a secret mission, and it's really thrilling to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they enjoy those cookies, they really earned them.
segments.speaker: PAR
